SELECT c.`cust_id`, c.`cust_name`, c.`cust_mobile`, c.`cust_email`, s.`dict_id` `cust_source`, s.`dict_item_name` `cust_source_name`, i.`dict_id` `cust_industry`, i.`dict_item_name` `cust_industry_name`, l.`dict_id` `cust_level`, l.`dict_item_name` `cust_level_name` FROM cst_customer c LEFT JOIN base_dict s ON c.`cust_source`= s.`dict_id` LEFT JOIN base_dict i ON c.`cust_industry`= i.`dict_id` LEFT JOIN base_dict l ON c.`cust_level`= l.`dict_id`
and c.`cust_name` like '%${cust_name}%'
